name: D - Formation
text: When a face-up "Destiny Hero" monster(s) you control is destroyed, place 1 D Counter on this card for each of those monsters. When you Normal or Special Summon a monster during your Main Phase, you can send this card with 2 or more D Counters to the Graveyard to add up to 2 cards with the same name as that monster from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand.
